results.title: Frocks on the docks
results.creator_credit: Liz Orr, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Liz Orr talks about the dress she bought between curtain calls, the fundraiser for Heather Osland’s defence and the fight to keep the union strong on Melbourne’s docks.

results.title: Bill's story
results.creator_credit: Lorraine Ermacora, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Lorraine Ermacora’s father-in-law Bill, an immigrant to Australia, stayed with her family he was prompted by a radio program on the first World War to relate his stories of his youth in Italy. He was instrumental in creating a family tradition of community involvement.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lorraine Ermacora, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: When Lorraine Ermacora’s father-in-law Bill, an immigrant to Australia, stayed with her family he was prompted by a radio program on the first World War to relate his stories of his youth in Italy. He was instrumental in creating a family tradition of community involvement.
description_for_label: When Lorraine Ermacora’s father-in-law Bill, an immigrant to Australia, stayed with her family he was prompted by a radio program on the first World War to relate his stories of his youth in Italy. He was instrumental in creating a family tradition of community involvement.

results.title: A Nana fish
results.creator_credit: Mullie Watson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Originally from Cherbourg, Mullie Watson tells of his fond memories of his nan, about the day they went fishing together and how an owl became his totem.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Mullie Watson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: This is a story about the land we live on
results.creator_credit: Alisha Dark, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: This land has cared for our ancestors for generations and now it’s our turn to care for it. We need to take responsibility. This story is about Alisha’s personal connection with the land.
results.title_for_label: This is a story about the land we live on
results.creator_credit_for_label: Alisha Dark, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.creator_credit: Tristan Mungatopi, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Growing up in two worlds allows me to give back to my community. Tristan Mungatopi, a young Tiwi man’s search for identity and connection.

results.title: Behind the scenes
results.creator_credit: Tim Kanoa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Six Indigenous Youth Leadership Programme scholars were invited to participate in a Digital Storytelling workshop at ACMI in June 2007. Here is a glimpse behind the scenes of the workshop and interviews with the participants on their experience.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tim Kanoa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
